# Oper - Data Analyst

::: {.career-entry}

<div class="career-text">

#### ● Mar 2024 - Aug 2025 (1 year and 5 months)

As a Data Analyst, I collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to analyze large
datasets and deliver insights that improved decision-making for clients. I designed
and optimized data pipelines to enhance accessibility and processing efficiency,
and I created and maintained dozens of interactive dashboards and reports for major
national and international clients.

These solutions contributed to more than R$2,500,000 in additional gross profit and
supported long-term business growth. Throughout these projects, I worked with a wide
range of technologies, including R, Python, SQL, Azure Databricks, PySpark, Excel,
and Shiny, to build analyses, reports, dashboards, and ETL pipelines.

</div>
